function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High reliability of multi-item scales","Impact":"Misleading or biased results from unreliable data","Mitigation":"Use multiple data collection methods and cross-validate results","Technologies":"Data validation and cross-checking software","People":"Researchers, statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Cluster analysis based on perceived threat, susceptibility, fear, and attitude","Impact":"Overgeneralization of consumer segments leading to ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Include additional factors to refine consumer segment descriptions","Technologies":"Advanced statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms","People":"Data scientists, consumer behavior experts","Owner":"Market research team"},{"Description":"Labeling of consumer segments (e.g. Rationals, maladaptive consumers)","Impact":"Stigmatization of certain consumer groups based on behavior","Mitigation":"Use neutral and descriptive labels for consumer segments","Technologies":"Consumer sentiment analysis, qualitative research methods","People":"Consumer psychologists, market researchers","Owner":"Market research team"}]}
